Summary: 2 Balls of light that were the brightest white Ive ever seen in broad day light
divs: Sighting DetailsA friend and I were on his deck just socializing and saw a bright sphere light up and then seconds later a second one close by lite up. Both of them were extremly bright. This was in broad saylight with a perfectly clear sky. The both moved at a high rate of speed and were stationary at times. They both just disappeared with mo trace. They were so bright it could be best described as bright as a blow tourch
